alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Dallas; Lowndes (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 28 at 8:09PM CDT until March 30 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River At R.F. Henry Lock and Dam affecting Autauga, Lowndes and Dallas Counties. .Flooding continues on the Alabama River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT TO THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River At R.F. Henry Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night to Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 122.0 feet, Flooding of agricultural lands begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 115.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 122.0 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 122.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
